summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2824 for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue Southwest, from West Andover Street to West Genesee Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33906, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
